alert.note: Alert for Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:03PM CDT until August 07 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL GRANT COUNTY... At 502 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hyannis, or 28 miles north of Arthur, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported golf ball sized hail in Hyannis. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hyannis, Pratt Lake, Spring Valley Lake and Duluth. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 138 and 154. Highway 61 between mile markers 146 and 165. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
